dtliExcerpt: This revival of A.R. Gurney's 1995 comedy about a marriage disrupted by a stray dog is a shaggy-dog story that really delivers, thanks largely to a phenomenal performance by Annaleigh Ashford.
showScoreExcerpt: This revival of A.R. Gurney's 1995 comedy about a marriage disrupted by a stray dog is a shaggy-dog story that really delivers, thanks largely to a phenomenal performance by Annaleigh Ashford.
